replies.body:
I wish I had some artistic ability, sadly I don't. 

But I'm looking forward to seeing what cool artwork that comes about from this contest !!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Logged in just to upvote. Can relate {{champion:32}}

Cant u just let the people buy those both skins
I just bought $50 gift card for both of this skins
And i really want them both
...these two skins are available for EVERYONE at the price of 1820RP each. The winners get it for free though.
Sorry to be one of those people but I just wanted to check that my submission came through before the closing time since I left it till the last minute!
We have your entry
thanks!
Does it have to be only two champions? At the most I'd have a 2v2, maybe a 1v2, but I wanted to show teamwork/cooperation.
can we draw it as if its in game with the hub with hp, mana ,ect?
Do the Champions have to have there original skins? Or can you draw them with a certain skin of your choice? Thanks!{{champion:432}}
Can be any skin as long as its clear which champion you are drawing.

soz cant draw so I'll just let you imagine my drawing riven yas about to fight but the battle zone is full of  teemo shrooms they both die then both  get deleted from league and everyone is happier and we even throw a party and we drink the blood of the dead poro's.

Hi, this might be a little bit late to get a reply, but i re-entered mine after making a few adjustments just now, and i was wondering if i can get a confirmation on my re-entered entry? It should say next to my summoner name that i re-entered after making some adjustments. 

Thanks heaps!
We got the adjustment entry.
Thank you! :D
got it =D
YAY

'Tis with great shame indeed that I submit an incomplete work :(

It never got past the planning stage... Was too good a composition not to share, though!
RIP This account, GiwrgosK13 , got hacked.
and somehow I am still logged in to it but i cant change the password or email ...
Thats fine =D
Is our own logos allowed too?
Yup =D
Are we allowed to draw something silly/fun/not-serious? Such as champs in Pool Party skins having a water fight?
we would prefer something epic, but what you're describing is within the rules.
Hey Maraudaur buddy, just wanting to confirm that my entry came through?  ( 2 V's, no W :P )
got your entry
Hey, does it matter which email I entered with? cause I put in my league account email that I barely use but I re-uploaded it with the email I use thats tied to another league account D:
We will reach out to you through your latest submission if need be =D
i suddenly had an idea.. what if it was kindred vs kindred? like lamb vs wolf does that count xd
That sounds interesting! but unfortunately this time in the rules it says you need to depict two champions.
ah i see thank youu
Are we allowed more than one post or more than one submission if we want to draw more?
And also are we allowed to draw rivalries with Skin Lore, like certain skins have different lore attached to it (ie: Dark Star Thresh vs Sol)

more than welcome to have multiple entries and skins are fine as long as its still clear which champions are depicted. But we do recommend you spend more time perfecting 1 piece vs getting to good pieces in. GL excited to see your submissions.
Hi, just checking if you got my submission! It'd be nice to have an email notification saying whether we've entered or not~

Hi,

We have your entry =D 

I will definitely look into that for next time. Is the confirmation screen after you submit not enough?

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=QhQ8ya2y,comment-id=00200000,timestamp=2017-07-04T03:29:10.836+0000)
>
> Hi,
> 
> We have your entry =D 
> 
> I will definitely look into that for next time. Is the confirmation screen after you submit not enough?

Hi! Thanks for the feedback! 

Even with the confirmation screen - after leaving the page there's no other way to personally confirm that we've already entered. Although we can re-enter, I thought it would be easier (as well as reassuring) to have an email confirming the specific piece that we've entered (this will also help determine each specific entry that the person has given if they've sent more than one)

Ahh yes I thought that might be the reasoning (seeing the page but wanting to be sure after you left the confirmation page days later). Definitely something I will keep in mind for future events! thanks for the feedback.
Are you able to re-enter if you have already entered? Cos I found a few tiny errors in my original submission
You may reenter =D

Hi, just a question on the image size/dimensions, does it absolutely HAVE to be 1920x1080? So are we not allowed to use any other size/dimensions?

Thanks!
it must be 1920x1080
Just wanted to check if my submission was received. Is it alright to upload to social media before the competition is over or do we have to wait until after? Thanks for organizing these Maraudaur :)
Got your submission. You may post on social media before hand if you would like =D
Master rules - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/contest-master-rules (didn't link through properly in the post.)
HEY, is it ok if i give characters items ? for example jax holding  gun blade?
Yup thats cool, as long as the champions are still recognizable
